 <section headerLabel="Morisky 8-Item Medication Adherence Questionnaire">
            <table class="baseline-aligned">
                
				<tr>
                   
		 
                    <br/><b>Select the following depending upon patient response</b>
                </tr>


               
				
				
                <tr>
                    <td>1.Do you sometimes forget to take your medicine?</td>
                    <td>
                        <obs conceptId="6288" style="radio" class="Finding"/>
                    </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>2.People sometimes miss taking their medicines for reasons other than forgetting. Thinking over the past 2 weeks, were there any days when you did not take your medicine?</td>
                    <td>
                        <obs conceptId="6288" style="radio"/>
                    </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>3.Have you ever cut back or stopped taking your medicine without telling your doctor because you felt worse when you took it?</td>
                    <td>
                        <obs conceptId="6288" style="radio"/>
                    </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>4.When you travel or leave home, do you sometimes forget to bring along your medicine?</td>
                    <td>
                        <obs conceptId="6288" style="radio"/>
                    </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>5.Did you take all your medicines yesterday?</td>
                    <td>
                        <obs conceptId="6288" style="radio"/>
                    </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>6.When you feel like your symptoms are under control, do you sometimes stop taking your medicine?</td>
                    <td>
                        <obs conceptId="6288" style="radio"/>
                    </td>
                </tr>
				<tr>
                    <td>7.Taking medicine every day is a real inconvenience for some people. Do you ever feel hassled about sticking to your treatment plan?</td>
                    <td>
                        <obs conceptId="6288" style="radio"/>
                    </td>
                </tr>
				<tr>
                    <td>8. How often do you have difficulty remembering to take all your medicine?</td>
                    <td>
                        <obs conceptId="6288" style="radio"/>
                    </td>
                </tr>
				
			  <tr>
				<b><obs conceptId="6233" /></b>
				</tr>
	    <tr>
            <td>
                
                <b><obs conceptId="6337" labelText="Adherence:" required="true"/></b>
				
            </td>
        </tr>
 
    <script type="text/javascript">


         function calcscore() {
            var score = 0;
            jQuery("input[type=radio]:checked").each(function () {
                if (jQuery(this).val() == 6296) {
                    score += 0;
                }
                else if (jQuery(this).val() == 6295) {
                    score += 1;
                }
		
            });
            var diagnosis = "";
            if (score == 0) {
                diagnosis = "Highly Adherent";
            }
            else if (score &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; score &lt;= 3) {
                    diagnosis = "Moderate Adherent";
            }
            else if (score &gt; 4 &amp;&amp; score &lt;= 10) {
                diagnosis = "Non-Adherent";
              }
            
            jQuery("input[name=w106]").val(diagnosis);
            jQuery("input[name=w10]").val(Score)

        }

        jQuery().ready(function () {
            jQuery("input[type=radio]").change(function () {
                calcscore();
            });
        });	
		</script>
		
	</table>
</section>			
				
 
<h1>Screen for Diabetes Complicatons</h1>
  <section headerLabel="COMPLICATIONS">
		<table class="vertical-align">
   <tr><td><b>RETINOPATHY:</b> 
                 <br/>
                  <p>Retinal Eye Exam</p>
                      Eye Exam Date:<obs conceptId="6271"/>
	             RETINOPATHY:<obs conceptId="6274"  style="yes_no"  yesLabel="Yes" noLabel="No"/> 
              </td></tr>
<br/>
       <tr><td><b>NEPHROPATHY:</b>
          <br/>Exam Date:<obs conceptId="6271"/>Urine albumin:<obs conceptId="849" showUnits=" mg/dL"/><br/>
          <br/>Exam Date:<obs conceptId="6271"/>BUN:<obs conceptId="857" showUnits=" mmol/L" /><br/>
           </td></tr>
			  
	<tr><td><b>NEUROPATHY:</b> 
        <p> • Check feet for lesions and sensation (10-g monofilament or 128 Hz
             tuning fork)
         <br/>
            • Check for pain, ED, GI symptoms </p><br/>
           Exam Date:<obs conceptId="6271"/><br/>
           <br/>NEUROPATHY:<obs conceptId="6273"  style="yes_no"  yesLabel="Yes" noLabel="No"/> 
              </td></tr>
             <br/>

            <br/>
                  Exam Date:<obs conceptId="6271"/>

              </td></tr>

		<table class="vertical-align">
		   <p><b>Use Ctrl/Command + Mouse Right Click</b></p>
